mapper.sql: ID, BEHAVIOR_ID, BE_MANAGE_ID, CREATED, CREATER, UPDATED, UPDATER, DEL_FLAG, DISCIPLINARY_TIME, PROCESSING_TIME, EVENT_REMINDER_TYPE, REASON, PROCESSING_PEOPLE, PROCESSING_TELEPHONE, SPECIFIC_REASONS, DESCRIPTION, RECTIFICATION_MAN, RECTIFICATION_DATE, RECTIFICATION_REASONS, CULPRIT_ID, PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID, (select g.name from SYS_GROUP g left join SF_CULPRIT c on g.id=c.GROUP_ID where c.id=CULPRIT_ID) groupName, (select c.name from SF_CULPRIT c where c.id=CULPRIT_ID) culpritName, (select c.REDRESS_START_DATE from SF_CULPRIT c where c.id=CULPRIT_ID) redressStartDate, (select c.REDRESS_END_DATE from SF_CULPRIT c where c.id=CULPRIT_ID) redressEndDate, (select c.ACCOUNTNAME from SYS_ACCOUNT c where c.id=RECTIFICATION_MAN) rectificationManName
mapper.insert: insert into SF_NO_DEAL (ID, BEHAVIOR_ID, BE_MANAGE_ID, CREATED, CREATER, UPDATED, UPDATER, DEL_FLAG, DISCIPLINARY_TIME, PROCESSING_TIME, EVENT_REMINDER_TYPE, REASON, PROCESSING_PEOPLE, PROCESSING_TELEPHONE, SPECIFIC_REASONS, DESCRIPTION, RECTIFICATION_MAN, RECTIFICATION_DATE, RECTIFICATION_REASONS, CULPRIT_ID, PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{behaviorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beManageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{disciplinaryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{processingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{eventReminderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processingPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processingTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specificReasons,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rectificationMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rectificationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rectificationReasons,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update SF_NO_DEAL
BEHAVIOR_ID = #{behaviorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BE_MANAGE_ID = #{beManageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DISCIPLINARY_TIME = #{disciplinaryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PROCESSING_TIME = #{processingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EVENT_REMINDER_TYPE = #{eventReminderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESSING_PEOPLE = #{processingPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESSING_TELEPHONE = #{processingTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPECIFIC_REASONS = #{specificReasons,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECTIFICATION_MAN = #{rectificationMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECTIFICATION_DATE = #{rectificationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RECTIFICATION_REASONS = #{rectificationReasons,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SF_NO_DEAL set BEHAVIOR_ID = #{behaviorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BE_MANAGE_ID = #{beManageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DISCIPLINARY_TIME = #{disciplinaryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PROCESSING_TIME = #{processingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EVENT_REMINDER_TYPE = #{eventReminderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESSING_PEOPLE = #{processingPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESSING_TELEPHONE = #{processingTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPECIFIC_REASONS = #{specificReasons,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECTIFICATION_MAN = #{rectificationMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECTIFICATION_DATE = #{rectificationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RECTIFICATION_REASONS = #{rectificationReasons,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

sql.if: AND exists (select * from SF_CULPRIT c where c.id=t.CULPRIT_ID and c.name like '%'||#{culpritName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%')
AND exists ( select g.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) g left join SF_CULPRIT c on g.id=c.group_id where c.id=CULPRIT_ID)
